title: Enormous inter-country inequality of embodied carbon emissions and its driving forces in South America

Source: Global Environmental Change, Volume 89

Author(s): Zhenyu Wang, Huaxi Peng, Jing Meng, Heran Zheng, Jie Li, Jingwen Huo, Yuxin Chen, Quan Wen, Xiaotian Ma, Dabo Guan
